MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge, affecting properties in Crammond Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.02pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complexity of repairs required and we are now arranging for generators to be brought to site, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.41pm on the 17th of February 2021.
